entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 p.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 4:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain except rain along parts of the coast. Ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 10:10 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Rain along parts of the coast early in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:10 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 10:10 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
